channel.title: Comments on: A Reunion and a Wedding
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: Jenny
item.dc:creator: Jenny
item.description: And to think I spent the last decade feeling guilty for not going to that reunion. Guess that means I'm off the hook for the 20 year reunion coming up.
item.content:encoded: And to think I spent the last decade feeling guilty for not going to that reunion. Guess that means I’m off the hook for the 20 year reunion coming up.
